author: Simon Difford
description: Bourbon and cola with a splash of aromatic bitters. America's answer to Britain's G&T is a sight more rock 'n' roll â€“ or even heavy metal. In contrast the G&T is more Chamber orchestra.
name: Lemmy
recipeIngredient: 120 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass
